organizations.name: Snapchat

organizations.name: Square
organizations.desc: Square is a merchant services aggregator and mobile payment company that aims to simplify commerce through technology.

organizations.name: Cloudera

organizations.name: Digg
organizations.desc: Digg is the homepage of the internet, featuring the best articles, videos, and original content that the web is talking about right now.

organizations.name: Foursquare
organizations.desc: Foursquare is a location-based social network where users receive points and virtual badges for 'checking in' at selected venues.

organizations.name: LinkedIn

organizations.name: Groupon

organizations.name: Jelly

organizations.name: Whisper
